dcterms:description: The WVS collects data on cultural values in different countries in waves, and our questions come from Wave 7 which ran from 2017 to 2020 and targets 57 countries. Survey results are published per question, organised in 13 categories.
dcterms:title: World Values Survey (WVS)

dcterms:description: Flores-101 is an evaluation benchmark for low-resource and multilingual machine translation, providing a diverse set of translation tasks across multiple languages.
dcterms:title: Flores-101

dcterms:creator: Christos Christodouloupoulos
Mark Steedman
dcterms:description: A massively parallel corpus containing the Bible translated into 100 languages, useful for linguistic research and machine translation.
dcterms:title: Parallel Bible Corpus (PBC)

dcterms:creator: Jörg Tiedemann
dcterms:description: The Tanzil dataset provides parallel translations of the Quran in multiple languages, serving as a resource for linguistic studies and machine translation.
dcterms:title: Tanzil Dataset
